implementation_summary.priority_field: Added optional priority: int | None field to Todo dataclass with default None
implementation_summary.set_priority_method: Added set_priority() method with validation (None or 1-3)
implementation_summary.serialization: Updated from_dict() to deserialize priority field; to_dict() includes priority via asdict()
implementation_summary.backwards_compatible: Existing todos without priority field default to None

notes: CLI --sort=priority feature not implemented as it was outside the minimal scope for the core Todo dataclass. The priority field foundation is complete and ready for CLI integration.
